title: Dangerous Comedy
description: Big Jay is attacked on stage at an outdoor comedy show in Pennsylvania. Dan and Jay discussed The Discovery Channel’s odd programming theme on this year’s, “Shark Week.”
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
